name: The Diamond Heist
description:
Art by: GibbonGL, Pixel Pete, Reakain, CommandeQ, HalteF4 and me!

Finally, today is the day you are going to become the world’s greatest thief! The Moon’s Eye Diamond has just started being displayed in the museum, and you just KNOW it is your destiny to grab that big score. Outwit the police, break out of prisons, and face off against other thieves in the Diamond Thief! Do you have what it takes to get the big score?
